title: Unemployment rate in Canada , by industry 2019
summary: The Unemployment rate Industry in the by industry was Business_building_and_other_support_services , who made 7.3 rate .
The most rate Industry was Information_culture_and_recreation , with just 1.5 rate .

In second place is Industry Construction with 6.7 rate ; third place went to Industry Forestry_fishing_mining_quarrying_oil_and_gas with 7.3 rate ; fourth place went to Industry Health_care_and_social_assistance with 1.5 rate and fifth place went to Industry Accommodation_and_food_services , who made 5.5 rate .

data.Industry: Forestry fishing mining quarrying oil and gas

gold: This statistic shows the rate of unemployment in Canada in 2019 , by industry . In 2019 , the agricultural industry in Canada had an unemployment rate of 4.4 percent . The health care and social assistance industry had the lowest unemployment rate , at 1.5 percent .
